sys_properties.description: object array of preferences users can modify to change aspects of the portal
sys_properties.name: x_176383_star_wars.swrpg.user_preferences
sys_properties.value: [{"name": "show_rank_one_talent_badge","description" : "If checked, all character talents will have a numeric badge. If unchecked, only talents with multiple ranks unlocked will show a badge.", "type" : "boolean", "value" : ""},{"name":"show_character_sheet_gametable","description":"If checked, when a character is part of a campaign with an active session, the character sheet will display the gametable button.", "type":"boolean","value":"true"}]
